meta.title: Srinath Shrestha | Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing full stack development work and skills

about.bio: I'm a passionate full stack developer specializing in modern web technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js. Currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering at Bennett University with hands-on experience in building collaborative platforms and AI-powered applications.
focus: Building responsive and interactive web applications
Creating AI-powered solutions with modern tech stacks

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experience.description: Designed and developed multiple internal tools streamlining company workflows and reducing manual processes. Built automated internal workload management system improving team productivity and task allocation efficiency.

Designed and developed multiple internal tools streamlining company workflows

experience.title: Frontend Developer Intern
experience.description: Developed Heliosensium, an AI-powered parenting assistant providing personalized advice based on child development stages. Built responsive React.js interface with intuitive UX/UI design, resulting in high user satisfaction rate.
achievements: Integrated machine learning models for personalized content recommendation and implemented secure user data handling
Collaborated with cross-functional team to deliver MVP within 4-month timeline, exceeding performance benchmarks
Built responsive React.js interface with intuitive UX/UI design

experience.title: Backend Developer

Built backend architecture for AI-powered resume generation
